globalShortTerm._comment: Daily session summaries - tokenLimit calculated: workingDays × 1500

projectShortTerm._comment: Project-specific daily history - tokenLimit calculated: workingDays × 1500

projectSettings._comment: If true, /project/subdir matches /project for project memory loading

synthesis._comment: Minimum hours between auto-synthesis prompts (always runs on first session of day)

decay._comment: Learnings older than ageDays are archived; archived items older than archiveRetentionDays are purged

_tokenGuidance.estimation: 1 token ≈ 4 characters. File bytes / 4 = rough token count
_tokenGuidance.formula: Short-term limits = workingDays × 1500 (based on ~1200 observed max)
